title: Profile picture is not updated for another user if it was updated while they were offline
body:
# Bug Report


## Problem 

Sometimes the profile picture is not updated on the UserA side until opening the profile if it was changed by UserB while UserA was offline. 

Sometimes the photo is updated quite quickly when you just open the app (without additional actions), but sometimes only certain actions trigger the update, e.g. sending the app to the background, opening a profile, or receiving a message. 

### Reproduction (reproducible in ~50% of cases)

1. UserA: add UserB to contacts
2. UserA and UserB: send some messages to each other
3. UserA: close the app/go offline
4. UserB: wait ~ 5 min and update the photo
5. UserA: go online
6. UserA: try to wait for UserB's photo update
7. UserA: open UserB's profile (at this moment the photo always updates)


#### Expected behavior

The photo of UserB is updated immediately after (without any additional actions/triggers)  UserA returns online 

#### Actual behavior

https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/67952253/b87502aa-0c7f-4cd7-9e59-6a030948e6c6



### Additional Information

- Status version: reproduction with these specific steps is possible in PR https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/18440 or in develop after the PR is merged 
- Operating System: Android, iOS

### Logs 

Logs (UserA): [Status-debug-logs (83).zip](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/files/13991584/Status-debug-logs.83.zip)
